subject: Basketball
Documentary Films and Programs
lead_paragraph: For Spike Lee’s latest documentary, “Kobe Doin’ Work,” he persuaded Kobe Bryant to allow 30 cameras to follow him over the course of one game.
snippet: For Spike Lee’s latest documentary, “Kobe Doin’ Work,” he persuaded Kobe Bryant to allow 30 cameras to follow him over the course of one game.
